input.oldString:
const swapLanguages = () => {
    if (sourceLang === "auto" || operation !== 'translate') return
    
    setSourceLang(targetLang)
    setTargetLang(sourceLang)
    setSourceText(resultText)
    setResultText(sourceText)
  }
input.newString:
const swapLanguages = () => {
    if (sourceLang === "auto" || activeTab !== 'translate') return
    
    setSourceLang(targetLang)
    setTargetLang(sourceLang)
    setSourceText(resultText)
    setResultText(sourceText)
  }
